Replace.Text: Attendance is still required for this quarter

"Go to work": Obtain the research progress equal to the current [ICON_SCIENCE] technology value and the faith value equal to the current [ICON_FAITH] faith income, which is a featured project. Great Evolution Vientiane +2% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Productivity [NewLine] "Touching Fish" : Obtain [ICON_CULTURE] municipal progress equal to the current cultural value and gold coins equal to the current [ICON_GOLD] gold coin income, for the featured project Great Evolution Vientiane -1% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Productivity [NewLine]
There is no need to check in today~ work is worse than sleep~[NewLine]
You don’t need to check in this quarter anymore~ Sleep is worse than work~[NewLine]
Obtain four "character" cards in total to unlock the special policy card·Zheng Fan
Obtain four "bar" cards in total to unlock the special policy card · grab bar
Obtain four "Cake" cards in total to unlock special policy cards and listening cards
Obtain four "character" cards, four "bar" cards, and four "cake" cards in total to unlock special policy cards. The joy of playing alone

[ICON_VisLimited] Increase the diplomatic visibility by 1 level, and you can get double combat power from the [ICON_VisLimited] diplomatic visibility advantage [NewLine] The spy level in the territory is reduced by 3 levels. When the spy is captured or killed, the enemy spy is upgraded for each level. Civilization provides 50 [ICON_SCIENCE] technology value and 50 [ICON_FAITH] faith value

After the construction of the characteristic area, the city can consume "computing power" to carry out "work", and unlock the characteristic project derivation. Every time the characteristic project derivation enters a new era, it will get 1 "computing power". The base has 3 "computing power", the redundant "computing power" cannot be brought into the next era, and the "work" can be performed at most once per round. Bonus[NewLine] Provide 10% to civilization after completing five times[ICON_SCIENCE][ICON_CULTURE][ICON_GOLD][ICON_FOOD][ICON_PRODUCTION][ICON_FAITH]Full output[NewLine]After completing ten times[ICON_VisLimited]Increase diplomatic visibility by 1 level , +2 vision for all your units [NewLine] After completing twenty times, you will get a free spy and spy capacity [NewLine] After completing thirty times, the effect of offensive espionage action will increase by 1 level, and the spy will get the target city after completing the offensive mission [NewLine] ICON_SCIENCE][ICON_CULTURE][ICON_GOLD][ICON_FAITH]50% of the output value of science and technology culture gold coin belief value
Divinators who love to work overtime
a fortune teller who intends to resign
"Working is not a struggle for value, it is labor in exchange for remuneration; taking time off while working is to strive for value for yourself."

The rebel city will skip the free city stage and become a friend of Qingque directly. " and "Moving Fish" choose one of the two [NewLine] "Moving Fish" can get a piece of Digaki Qiongyu at the same time, after collecting all 4 pieces of Digaki Qiongyu of the same suit, a powerful exclusive policy card will be unlocked
Checking in so early today? Really diligent.

[ICON_VisLimited] Diplomatic visibility increased by 1 level, +5% [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka, each population is civilization +1 [ICON_SCIENCE] Technology value +1 [ICON_FAITH] Faith value (only effective) [NewLine] When the total number of civilizations reaches After 100, [ICON_VisLimited] diplomatic visibility increased by 1 level, +5% [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka, each population is additionally civilized +1 [ICON_SCIENCE] technology value +1 [ICON_FAITH] faith value (only effective)

Adjacent: Adjacent to each mountain gains standard [ICON_PRODUCTION] Productivity, [ICON_Science] Science and [ICON_FAITH] Faith bonuses. Gain high [ICON_Science] technology value and [ICON_FAITH] faith value bonus with wonders, regions and another Da Yan Qiong Temple grid.
Immediately get a random [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka, enter a new era and get a random [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka
All plots in this city +1 [ICON_SCIENCE] technology value
Entering a new era provides an additional +1 "computing power"

Unlock the builder's ability to build Taibos's characteristic building, four to chess hall, and each city can create at most one. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+2[ICON_GOLD] gold coins, +1[ICON_SCIENCE] technology value, -2[ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity, +2[ICON_Amenities] livability, +2 loyalty, +2 loyalty pressure for the city you are in , but city expansion speed -50%. +2 [ICON_GOLD] gold coins for every adjacent wonder, +1 [ICON_GOLD] gold coins for every four adjacent chess and card halls, -4 [ICON_GOLD] gold coins, +2 [ICON_FAITH] faith , +4[ICON_PRODUCTION] Productivity, after researching "Computer", it will provide [ICON_TOURISM] tourism achievement according to [ICON_CULTURE] culture value.

The main output is [ICON_FAITH] Faith Value, [ICON_SCIENCE] Technology Value, [ICON_GreatScientist] Great Scientist Points. After completion, entering a new era will provide "computing power"
+25% [ICON_PRODUCTION] production for all districts and wonders
